name: clean-slate
description: CleanSlate is a self-hosted app designed for habit tracking and lifestyle improvement. It allows users to log daily routines, visualize progress, and set goals for habit formation via an intuitive web interface.
features: Habit Tracking: Log daily routines and habits. Build consistency.
Progress Visualization: See your habit streaks and progress. Stay motivated.
Goal Setting: Set and track lifestyle improvement goals. Achieve more.
Intuitive Interface: Easy-to-use web UI for daily logging. Minimal friction.
Lifestyle Improvement: Focus on building better habits. Personal growth.
Self-Hosted: Keep your habit data completely private. Personal journey.
